Paper.Title: Verb Phrase Ellipsis detection using Automatically Parsed Text

Section.Paragraph: This paper describes a Verb Phrase Ellipsis (VPE) detection system, built for robustness, accuracy and domain independence.

The system is corpus-based, and uses a variety of machine learning techniques on free text that has been automatically parsed using two difierent parsers. Tested on a mixed corpus comprising a range of genres, the system achieves a 72% F1-score. It is designed as the flrst stage of a complete VPE resolution system that is input free text, detects VPEs, and proceeds to flnd the antecedents and resolve them.
